dcterms:creator: Event Horizon Telescope Collaboration
dcterms:description: Simulated data generated from GRMHD simulations that describe the complex dynamics of the gas and plasma surrounding the black hole M87*.
dcterms:title: GRMHD Simulated Data

dcterms:creator: Event Horizon Telescope Collaboration
dcterms:description: A library of simulations used to model the appearance of M87* by fitting GRMHD models to the observed image.
dcterms:title: Simulation Library

dcterms:creator: Event Horizon Telescope Collaboration
dcterms:description: A collection of synthetic black hole images generated from GRMHD simulations using general relativistic ray tracing.
dcterms:title: Image Library

dcterms:creator: Event Horizon Telescope Collaboration
dcterms:description: General relativistic ray tracing simulations based on GRMHD data to create synthetic images of black holes.
dcterms:title: GRRT Simulations

dcterms:creator: Event Horizon Telescope Collaboration
dcterms:description: Images of the supermassive black hole M87* captured by the Event Horizon Telescope, showcasing the black hole's shadow and surrounding emission.
dcterms:title: M87* Black Hole Images

dcterms:creator: Event Horizon Telescope Collaboration
dcterms:description: Models representing different accretion flow dynamics around black holes, specifically SANE and MAD models.
dcterms:title: SANE and MAD Models

dcterms:creator: Event Horizon Telescope Collaboration
dcterms:description: A dataset containing parameters used to characterize the GRMHD simulations and their corresponding images.
dcterms:title: Parameterization Dataset

dcterms:creator: Event Horizon Telescope Collaboration
dcterms:description: An augmented dataset created by applying data augmentation techniques to the original GRMHD images to enhance training for deep learning models.
dcterms:title: Augmented Dataset
